Title: Requires the department of education to report information regarding counselors, social workers and psychologists in schools
Summary: Requires the department of education to report information regarding counselors, social workers and psychologists in schools and to implement a plan to increase the school counselor, school social worker and school psychologist to student ratio to nationally accepted standards and provide funding for such.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the department of education to report information regarding counselors, social workers and psychologists in schools
